metadata.title: CVE-2017-14933 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: read_formatted_entries in dwarf2.c in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD)library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29, allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via a crafted ELFfile.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
